imdb.plot outline: "Conversations" with Rashaad King is a fusion podcast/talk series produced exclusively by RKG Entertainment for YouTube and iTunes. The podcast/talk series features writer-producer Rashaad King as Host. Features are exclusive one-on-one interviews led by King, produced as "special presentations" for the podcast. This is a weekly podcast/talk series that is shot on location in Los Angeles, California and will include 3-5 guest co-hosts during the round-table Conversations. Topics of Discussion include: relationships, business, politics, sports, entertainment, world news, culture, spirituality, finances and more.
imdb.title: Conversations for a Change
